name: Intergalactic Argo
description:
By the way, I forgot to add prompts. So press ENTER whenever you're at something that seems important. Like to continue dialogue, go into a ship, or collect an item.

A simple platformer with some action elements. You play as Blaygo, a space courier. Blaygo has suddenly received a request to deliver a package to a dangerous planet. You need to travel there and deliver this package, and hopefully not die in the process.

This is a "demo", and is not technically finished or polished. But I wanted to move onto a different project, but at least make the game completable. So, if you encounter a bug or seemingly unbalanced feature, there's your answer. More games will be coming.
